com.samsung.android.sdk.chord

Interface SchordChannel.StatusListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    SchordChannel

    public static interface SchordChannel.StatusListener
    This listener interface receives Chord channel events.
    Register this listener when you call the joinChannel() method to join a channel.
    Since:
    1.5
    Version:
    2.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ERROR_FILE_CANCELED
      Error code - Sender or receiver has canceled the file transfer.
      static int ERROR_FILE_CREATE_FAILED
      Error code - File could not be created in the receiver node.
      static int ERROR_FILE_NO_RESOURCE
      Error code - No memory could be allocated for the file.
      static int ERROR_FILE_REJECTED
      Error code - Receiver rejected the file transfer.
      static int ERROR_FILE_SEND_FAILED
      Error code - File transfer failed.
      static int ERROR_FILE_TIMEOUT
      Error code - File transfer timed out.
      static int ERROR_NONE
      File transfer succeeded.

      • onDataReceived

        void onDataReceived(String fromNode,
                  String fromChannel,
                  String payloadType,
                  byte[][] payload)
        Called when a data message is received.
        Parameters:
        fromNode - The name of the node sending the data.
        fromChannel - The name of the channel used for sending the data.
        payloadType - The user defined message type.
        payload - Array with the data package.
        Since:
        1.0

      • onUdpDataReceived

        void onUdpDataReceived(String fromNode,
                     String fromChannel,
                     String payloadType,
                     byte[][] payload,
                     String sessionName)
        Called when a UDP data message is received.
        Parameters:
        fromNode - The name of the node sending the data.
        fromChannel - The name of the channel used for sending the data.
        payloadType - The user defined message type.
        payload - Array with the data package.
        sessionName - The name of the session used by the sender.
        Since:
        2.0

      • onUdpDataDelivered

        void onUdpDataDelivered(String toNode,
                      String toChannel,
                      String reqId)
        Called when a UDP data message is sent.
        Parameters:
        toNode - The name of the node receiving the data.
        toChannel - The name of the channel used for sending the data.
        reqId - The request ID of the data sent.
        Since:
        2.0

      • onFileWillReceive

        void onFileWillReceive(String fromNode,
                     String fromChannel,
                     String fileName,
                     String hash,
                     String fileType,
                     String exchangeId,
                     long fileSize)
        Called when receiver receives notification about an attempt by the sender to send a file.
        Parameters:
        fromNode - The name of the node sending the file.
        fromChannel - The name of the channel used for sending the file.
        fileName - The original name of the file being transferred.
        hash - The hash value of the file. You can use it to detect changes in the source.
        fileType - The user defined file type
        exchangeId - Transmission ID of the file transfer.
        fileSize - The size of the file being transferred.
        Since:
        1.0

      • onFileChunkReceived

        void onFileChunkReceived(String fromNode,
                       String fromChannel,
                       String fileName,
                       String hash,
                       String fileType,
                       String exchangeId,
                       long fileSize,
                       long offset)
        Called when an individual chunk of the file is received.
        Parameters:
        fromNode - The name of the node sending the chunk.
        fromChannel - The name of the channel used for sending the chunk.
        fileName - The original name of the file being transferred.
        hash - The hash value of the file. You can use it to detect changes in the source.
        fileType - The user defined file type
        exchangeId - Transmission ID of the file transfer.
        fileSize - The size of the file being transferred.
        offset - The size of the already received chunks.
        Since:
        1.0

      • onFileReceived

        void onFileReceived(String fromNode,
                  String fromChannel,
                  String fileName,
                  String hash,
                  String fileType,
                  String exchangeId,
                  long fileSize,
                  String tmpFilePath)
        Called when a file transfer from a node finishes.
        When the file transfer finishes and this method is called, rename tmpFilePath with fileName or move the file to appropriate path.
        Parameters:
        fromNode - The name of the node sending the file.
        fromChannel - The name of the channel used for sending the file.
        fileName - The original name of the file being transferred.
        hash - The hash value of the file. You can use it to detect changes in the source.
        fileType - The user defined file type
        exchangeId - Transmission ID of the file transfer.
        fileSize - The size of the file received.
        tmpFilePath - The temporary storage path for the file. The file path is set when setTempDirectory() is called when Chord is initialized.
        Since:
        1.0

      • onFileChunkSent

        void onFileChunkSent(String toNode,
                   String toChannel,
                   String fileName,
                   String hash,
                   String fileType,
                   String exchangeId,
                   long fileSize,
                   long offset,
                   long chunkSize)
        Called when an individual chunk of the file is sent.
        Parameters:
        toNode - The name of the node receiving the file.
        toChannel - The name of the channel used for sending the file.
        fileName - The original name of the file being transferred.
        hash - Hash value of file it can be used to detect source data changes.
        fileType - The user defined file type
        exchangeId - Transmission ID of the file transfer.
        fileSize - The size of the file being transferred.
        offset - The size of the already sent chunks.
        chunkSize - The chunk size
        Since:
        1.0

      • onFileSent

        void onFileSent(String toNode,
              String toChannel,
              String fileName,
              String hash,
              String fileType,
              String exchangeId)
        Called when a file transfer to a node finishes.
        Parameters:
        toNode - The name of the node receiving the file. .
        toChannel - The name of the channel used for sending the file.
        fileName - The original name of the file being transferred.
        hash - The hash value of the file. You can use it to detect changes in the source.
        fileType - The user defined file type
        exchangeId - Transmission ID of the file transfer.
        Since:
        1.0

      • onFileFailed

        void onFileFailed(String node,
                String channel,
                String fileName,
                String hash,
                String exchangeId,
                int reason)
        Called when an error occurs during file transfer.
        Parameters:
        node - The name of the node where the error occurs.
        channel - The name of the channel where the error occurs.
        fileName - The original name of the file being transferred.
        hash - The hash value of the file. You can use it to detect changes in the source.
        exchangeId - Transmission ID of the file transfer.
        reason - The reason for the failure. The valid values for the reason are:
        ERROR_FILE_CANCELED
        ERROR_FILE_CREATE_FAILED, ERROR_FILE_NO_RESOURCE
        ERROR_FILE_REJECTED
        ERROR_FILE_SEND_FAILED
        ERROR_FILE_TIMEOUT
        Since:
        1.0

      • onMultiFilesWillReceive

        void onMultiFilesWillReceive(String fromNode,
                           String fromChannel,
                           String fileName,
                           String taskId,
                           int totalCount,
                           String fileType,
                           long fileSize)
        Called when receiver receives notification about an attempt by the sender to send multiple files.
        Parameters:
        fromNode - The name of the node sending the files.
        fromChannel - The name of the channel used to send the files.
        fileName - The original name of the file being transferred.
        taskId - Transmission ID of the file transfer.
        fileType - The user defined file type
        fileSize - The size of the files being transferred.
        Since:
        1.5
        See Also:
        acceptMultiFiles(String taskId, int chunkTimeoutMsec, int chunkRetries, long chunkSize), rejectMultiFiles(String taskId), setSendMultiFilesLimitCount(int count)

      • onMultiFilesChunkReceived

        void onMultiFilesChunkReceived(String fromNode,
                             String fromChannel,
                             String fileName,
                             String taskId,
                             int index,
                             String fileType,
                             long fileSize,
                             long offset)
        Called when an individual chunk of the file in a multiple file transfer is received.
        Parameters:
        fromNode - The name of the node sending the files.
        fromChannel - The name of the channel used to send the files.
        fileName - The original name of the file being transferred.
        taskId - Transmission ID of the file transfer.
        index - The index of the received file.
        fileType - The user defined file type
        fileSize - The size of the file being received.
        offset - The size of the already received chunks.
        Since:
        1.5

      • onMultiFilesReceived

        void onMultiFilesReceived(String fromNode,
                        String fromChannel,
                        String fileName,
                        String taskId,
                        int index,
                        String fileType,
                        long fileSize,
                        String tmpFilePath)
        Called when a file is received from a node in a multiple file transfer.
        It need to rename tmpFilePath with fileName or move to appropriate path.
        Parameters:
        fromNode - The name of the node sending the files.
        fromChannel - The name of the channel used to send the files.
        fileName - The original name of the file being transferred.
        taskId - Transmission ID of the file transfer.
        index - The index of the received file.
        fileType - The user defined file type
        fileSize - The size of the file received.
        tmpFilePath - The temporary storage path for the file. The path is set when setTempDirectory() is called when Chord is initialized.
        Since:
        1.5

      • onMultiFilesChunkSent

        void onMultiFilesChunkSent(String toNode,
                         String toChannel,
                         String fileName,
                         String taskId,
                         int index,
                         String fileType,
                         long fileSize,
                         long offset,
                         long chunkSize)
        Called when an individual chunk of the file in a multiple file transfer is sent.
        Parameters:
        toNode - The name of the node receiving the files.
        toChannel - The name of the channel used to send the files.
        fileName - The original name of the file being transferred.
        taskId - Transmission ID of the file transfer.
        index - The index of the file being transferred.
        fileType - The user defined file type
        fileSize - The size of the file being transferred.
        offset - The size of the already sent chunks.
        chunkSize - The size of the chunk being transferred.
        Since:
        1.5

      • onMultiFilesSent

        void onMultiFilesSent(String toNode,
                    String toChannel,
                    String fileName,
                    String taskId,
                    int index,
                    String fileType)
        Called when a file is sent to a node in a multiple file transfer.
        Parameters:
        toNode - The name of the node receiving the files.
        toChannel - The name of the channel used to send the files.
        fileName - The original name of the file being transferred.
        taskId - Transmission ID of the file transfer.
        index - The index of the file being transferred.
        fileType - The user defined file type
        Since:
        1.5

      • onMultiFilesFailed

        void onMultiFilesFailed(String node,
                      String channel,
                      String fileName,
                      String taskId,
                      int index,
                      int reason)
        Called when an error occurs during a multiple file transfer.
        Parameters:
        node - The name of the node where the error occurs.
        channel - The name of the channel where the error occurs.
        fileName - The original name of the file being transferred.
        taskId - Transmission ID of the file transfer.
        index - The index of the file for which the error occurred during transfer.
        reason - The reason for the failure. The valid values for the reason are:
        ERROR_FILE_CANCELED
        ERROR_FILE_CREATE_FAILED, ERROR_FILE_NO_RESOURCE
        ERROR_FILE_SEND_FAILED
        ERROR_FILE_TIMEOUT
        Since:
        1.5

      • onMultiFilesFinished

        void onMultiFilesFinished(String node,
                        String channel,
                        String taskId,
                        int reason)
        Called when a multiple file transfer finishes.
        Parameters:
        node - The name of the node receiving the files.
        channel - The name of the channel used to send the files.
        taskId - Transmission ID of the file transfer.
        reason - The reason the file transfer finished. The valid values for the reason are:
        ERROR_NONE
        ERROR_FILE_CANCELED
        ERROR_FILE_REJECTED
        ERROR_FILE_NO_RESOURCE
        ERROR_FILE_REJECTED
        ERROR_FILE_SEND_FAILED
        ERROR_FILE_TIMEOUT
        Since:
        1.5
